mapper.insert:
insert into mba_range_rise_common ( is_deleted,code,periods,quarter_rise,half_year_rise, update_time,create_time) VALUES
(0, #{RangeRiseRareDO.code}, #{RangeRiseRareDO.periods}, #{RangeRiseRareDO.quarterRise}, #{RangeRiseRareDO.halfYearRise},now(), now())
on duplicate key update is_deleted = 0,code=values(code),periods=values(periods), quarter_rise=values(quarter_rise), half_year_rise=values(half_year_rise),update_time=now()
